2Colors #permalink

defines all colors to be used in the document

2.1complimentary #permalink

generates a series of five monotone colors based on values passed

Examples
Default styling
markup/complimentary.html NOT FOUND!
$class
the class name for the generated colors [string]
markup/complimentary.html NOT FOUND!
$color
the color to modify five times [Color]
markup/complimentary.html NOT FOUND!
$ratio
the difference between each of the colors [Num.decimal]
markup/complimentary.html NOT FOUND! 
markup/complimentary.html NOT FOUND!

2.2color set #permalink

defines the color set of the website. Typically five are selected.

Examples
Default styling

hey there

that's rad

hey there

that's rad

this is the transparent

<div class="[modifier class]">
  <h2>hey there</h2>
  <p>that's rad</p>
  <h2 class='light'>hey there</h2>
  <p class='light'>that's rad</p>
</div>
<div class="[modifier class] transparent">
  <p>this is the transparent</p>
</div>
